name: JASEM: Just Another Shooter with Electronic Music
description: JASEM is insanely hard and ridiculously unforgiving low-poly twin-stick arcade blastathon set to an electronic beat and filled with bright explosions and neon effects.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Discrete with 1 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
